1.title: Rookies
1.plot: Rookie recruits must prove they have what it takes to be smokejumpers as they are put through paces at the North Cascades Smokejumper base, where smokejumping was born.

2.title: Jumping the Line
2.plot: Division Supervisor Steve Sabo joins the fight against the wildfire named Discovery, and fears that failure to contain this inferno will be costly.

3.title: Up in Smoke
3.plot: Rookie Pieper finds his future in smokejumping beginning to plummet while Division Supervisor Steve Sabo battles against the Discovery wildfire.

4.title: Extinguished
4.plot: Old habits threaten to send rookie Coburn packing as training comes to an end. Supervisor Steve Sabo is one step away from corralling Discovery.

imdb.plot outline: Sometimes our biggest heroes are never seen. Follow the dreams of young firefighters as they train to be smokejumpers for the honor of protecting our U.S. forests. Follow as they undergo harsh training and insane terrain to see if they have what it takes or risk facing elimination.
imdb.title: FireZone
plot: Sometimes our biggest heroes are never seen. Follow the dreams of young firefighters as they train to be smokejumpers for the honor of protecting our U.S. forests.::Halogen TV
